  • Constructor Details

    • Variable

      public Variable​(String initializeLine, boolean isArgument, Scope declaredScope) throws VariableError
      The Contractor of the Variable.
      Parameters:
      initializeLine - The initializing line (trimmed!)
      isArgument - True if this variable should is, else false.
      declaredScope - The scope where the variable was declared.
      Throws:
      VariableError - When the Variable declaration goes wrong.

  • Method Details

    • setData

      public void setData​(String dataStr, boolean isFromCallsHandler, Scope scope) throws VariableError
      Sets the Variable data to the given data.
      Parameters:
      dataStr - The new Variable Data as a String.
      isFromCallsHandler - True if the setData method is called from the CallsHandler, else false.
      scope - The scope from which the variable was created.
      Throws:
      VariableError - If the Variable data is invalid.

      public String getName()
      Gets the Variable name.

      The Variable name

    • isInitialized

      public boolean isInitialized()
      Gets the initialized status.
      Returns:
      True if the Variable is initialized, else false.

    • isFinal

      public boolean isFinal()
      Gets the final status.
      Returns:
      True if the Variable is final, else false.

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Removes the Variable object from the existing variables hash set.
